refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates a TGC shape with the specified apex (x y z) at one end (base [b] or top [t]) of the specified RCC.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Creates a TGC shape with the specified apex (x y z) at one end (base [b] or top [t]) of the specified RCC. The default end is the base.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the rcc-tgc command to create a TGC shape with the specified apex at the base of the specified RCC.

example.title: Create a TGC shape with a specified apex at the base of a specified RCC.
example.para: Creates a TGC shape named tgc.s with an apex at (0 2 4) from the base of rcc.s.
